mapper.insert: insert into dingtalk_menu (menu_id, menu_name, menu_parent_id, menu_url, menu_prmission, menu_sortd, menu_display, icon) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuPrmission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuSortd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuDisplay,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update dingtalk_menu set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_parent_id = #{menuParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_prmission = #{menuPrmission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_sortd = #{menuSortd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_display = #{menuDisplay,jdbcType=TINYINT}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where menu_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, menu_parent_id, menu_url, menu_prmission, menu_sortd, menu_display, icon from dingtalk_menu where menu_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
